verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שֹׁשַׁנִּ֑ים עֵד֖וּת <S%H7802><s%> upon Shoshannimeduth לְאָסָ֣ף <S%H623><s%> of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm רֹ֘עֵ֤ה <S%H7462><s%> O Shepherd יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַאֲזִ֗ינָה <S%H238><s%> Give ear נֹהֵ֣ג <S%H5090><s%> thou that leadest כַּצֹּ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> like a flock יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph יֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> thou that dwellest הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <S%H3742><s%> [between] the cherubims הוֹפִֽיעָה׃ <S%H3313><s%> shine forth

לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> Before אֶפְרַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וּבִנְיָ֘מִ֤ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וּמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> and Manasseh עוֹרְרָ֥ה <S%H5782><s%> stir up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבֽוּרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1369><s%> thy strength וּלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> and come לִישֻׁעָ֣תָה <S%H3444><s%> [and] save לָּֽנוּ׃
אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> O God הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <S%H3467><s%> and we shall be saved

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> How עָ֝שַׁ֗נְתָּ <S%H6225><s%> how long wilt thou be angry בִּתְפִלַּ֥ת <S%H8605><s%> against the prayer עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> You

הֶ֭אֱכַלְתָּם <S%H398><s%> Thou feedest לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> them with the bread דִּמְעָ֑ה <S%H1832><s%> of tears וַ֝תַּשְׁקֵ֗מוֹ <S%H8248><s%> to drink בִּדְמָע֥וֹת <S%H1832><s%> and givest them tears שָׁלִֽישׁ׃ <S%H7991><s%> in great measure

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <S%H7760><s%> Thou makest מָ֭דוֹן <S%H4066><s%> us a strife לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> unto our neighbours וְ֝אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ <S%H341><s%> and our enemies יִלְעֲגוּ־ <S%H3932><s%> laugh לָֽמוֹ׃

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> O God צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <S%H3467><s%> and we shall be saved

גֶּ֭פֶן <S%H1612><s%> a vine מִמִּצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt תַּסִּ֑יעַ <S%H5265><s%> Thou hast brought תְּגָרֵ֥שׁ <S%H1644><s%> thou hast cast out גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen וַתִּטָּעֶֽהָ׃ <S%H5193><s%> and planted

פִּנִּ֥יתָ <S%H6437><s%> Thou preparedst לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <S%H6440><s%> [room] before וַתַּשְׁרֵ֥שׁ <S%H8327><s%> root שָׁ֝רָשֶׁ֗יהָ <S%H8328><s%> it and didst cause it to take deep וַתְּמַלֵּא־ <S%H4390><s%> and it filled אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

כָּסּ֣וּ <S%H3680><s%> were covered הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> The hills צִלָּ֑הּ <S%H6738><s%> with the shadow וַ֝עֲנָפֶ֗יהָ <S%H6057><s%> of it and the boughs אַֽרְזֵי־ <S%H730><s%> cedars אֵֽל׃ <S%H410><s%> thereof [were like] the goodly

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> She sent out קְצִירֶ֣הָ <S%H7105><s%> her boughs עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> unto the sea וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָ֝הָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> unto the river יֽוֹנְקוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H3127><s%> and her branches

לָ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why פָּרַ֣צְתָּ <S%H6555><s%> Why hast thou [then] broken down גְדֵרֶ֑יהָ <S%H1447><s%> her hedges וְ֝אָר֗וּהָ <S%H717><s%> do pluck כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹ֥בְרֵי <S%H5674><s%> so that all they which pass דָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> by the way

יְכַרְסְמֶ֣נָּֽה <S%H3765><s%> doth waste חֲזִ֣יר <S%H2386><s%> The boar מִיָּ֑ עַר <S%H3293><s%> out of the wood וְזִ֖יז <S%H2123><s%> it and the wild beast שָׂדַ֣י <S%H7704><s%> of the field יִרְעֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H7462><s%> doth devour

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> we beseech thee O God צְבָאוֹת֮ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שֽׁ֫וּב־ <S%H7725><s%> Return נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> now הַבֵּ֣ט <S%H5027><s%> look down מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וּרְאֵ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> and behold וּ֝פְקֹ֗ד <S%H6485><s%> and visit גֶּ֣פֶן <S%H1612><s%> this vine זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> Even

וְ֭כַנָּה <S%H3657><s%> the shoot אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָטְעָ֣ה <S%H5193><s%> hath planted יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> which thy right hand וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on בֵּ֝֗ן <S%H1121><s%> and the branch אִמַּ֥צְתָּה <S%H553><s%> [that] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃

שְׂרֻפָ֣ה <S%H8313><s%> [It is] burned בָאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire כְּסוּחָ֑ה <S%H3683><s%> [it is] cut down מִגַּעֲרַ֖ת <S%H1606><s%> at the rebuke פָּנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> of thy countenance יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> they perish

תְּֽהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> Let יָ֭דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> Let thy hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> be upon אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> be upon the man יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <S%H3225><s%> of thy right hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> upon the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man אִמַּ֥צְתָּ <S%H553><s%> [whom] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not נָס֥וֹג <S%H5472><s%> So will not we go back מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> at תְּ֝חַיֵּ֗נוּ <S%H2421><s%> from thee quicken וּבְשִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> upon thy name נִקְרָֽא׃ <S%H7121><s%> us and we will call

יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> God צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn us again הָאֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <S%H3467><s%> and we shall be saved
